website_summaries.verdict: The GiiNii 8-inch Ultra-thin Digital Picture Frame is a good, pop-in-a-card-and-view photo display, though the execution of its features is disappointing.

customer_reviews.title: Digital photo frame
customer_reviews.text: I have this on constantly with my family trip to Italy before I lost my teenage children in a horrific carcràsh and my husband of over 30 years suddenly, leaving me alone. I love the memories and need to be reminded of happier times with them.
customer_reviews.author: Doreen Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use but picture quality isnt good. It's like all the photos were taken by a cell phone in 2006.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Bates

customer_reviews.title: It worked great for 4 years
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in 2016, i got 2 of them ,they both went bad this may 2020. So for the price they lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Milagros V. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Every other picture shows the clock on the screen.Can't turn it off.The remote never did work.
customer_reviews.author: R J Long

customer_reviews.title: We loved the first one so much that we ordered the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is our second GiiNii 8" Widescreen Digital photo frame. We loved the first one so much that we ordered the same one again. Took a chance because the model # was not on the box, but it turned out to be the same one. Very pleased!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy J.

customer_reviews.title: BIG DISAPPOINTMENT!
customer_reviews.text: This product is not all it is crack up to be. The images are not even close to as clear as the photo shown in the picture. I also did not get a manual with mine so I have no clue how to fix things. Some images aren't even showing up... but just as a big question mark. I got this as a gift for my mom and am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: R.G.

customer_reviews.title: I love this. I bought this for my mother who ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I bought this for my mother who is 80. She loves it. Instead of having to have picture frames sitting everywhere, which she does not have room for, she has the digital frame. It works great and we can add pictures any time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Picture issue
customer_reviews.text: It will show pictures for a moment or two then nothing can't get it to work correctly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a lot of changes
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to operate. It was just like the one we had and didn't have a bunch of extras on it.
customer_reviews.author: myrtle bauer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting much from this frame since I paid less than $40 for it, but it isn't bad. It is by no means high resolution, but for the cheapest 8" frame I've seen, I'm happy. The pictures are more than clear enough considering the frame's low resolution. It displays both my 16:9 and 4:3 pictures well, although the widescreen photos are better. The one thing I don't like is that there seems to be no way to keep the clock from displaying between pictures. EDIT: I've been corrected. The clock can be disabled. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: DLH

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy Giini frames...they do NOT work
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of the Giinii ditigal frames from Ocean Reef electronics via Amazon. One will not turn-on. The other turned on, I loaded some photos and now it too will not turn on. But the WORST part is that both GIINII AND OCEAN REEF DO NOT ANSWER THEIR PHONES. Giinii products are worthless crap and there is NO customer support. Save your money...AVOID THEM!!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Hirschtick

customer_reviews.title: Not very good
customer_reviews.text: I received this as a gift for Christmas. It was a royal pain in the butt to figure out at first, and the paperwork doesn't help very much. It took me a long time to figure out how to get the clock from appearing between pictures. The resolution is very low and compared to other picture frames in this price range, it doesn't compare. Don't get me wrong, it's not a horrible item for the money, but if you spend another [...], you can get one that is much much better.
customer_reviews.author: Mike H

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Received this frame as a gift from our son. I was frustrated with some of the features. Using GiiNii.com and selecting tutorials, I was able to resolve some of my frustration.
customer_reviews.author: L. McGlothlin

customer_reviews.title: How do you stop the clock between pictures
customer_reviews.text: We recived the picture frame for Christmas also.I love the being able to see the pictures every 30 sec. or so but I think that the clock is a problem I don't want to look at it everytime.Can you change it, so maybe you only see it every 15 mins.or so?
customer_reviews.author: Carol E. Manke

product_meta.title: GiiNii 8" Widescreen Digital Photo Frame
feature_bullets: This Certified Refurbished product is tested and certified to look and work like new. The refurbishing process includes functionality testing, basic cleaning, inspection, and repackaging. The product ships with all relevant accessories, a minimum 90-day warranty, and may arrive in a generic box.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars25 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
